name: 王柏
objective:
本課程旨在為大學部同學提供一個深入了解自媒體行銷的機會，透過學習影片製作、自媒體營銷策略、個人品牌建立等相關知識和技能，培養學生能夠利用自媒體平台有效地行銷自己，無論是求職、發展個人職涯，或者自我表達與溝通。
This course aims to provide undergraduate students with an in-depth understanding of self-media marketing, offering opportunities to learn about topics such as video production, self-media marketing strategies, personal branding, and other relevant knowledge and skills. It aims to cultivate students' ability to effectively market themselves through self-media platforms, whether for job seeking, personal career development, or self-expression and communication.
